books.title: Git Pocket Guide
books.subTitle: A Working Introduction
books.author: Richard E. Silverman
books.description: This pocket guide is the perfect on-the-job companion to Git, the distributed version control system. It provides a compact, readable introduction to Git for new users, as well as a reference to common commands and procedures for experienced users.

books.title: Learning React
books.subTitle: Functional Web Development with React and Redux
books.author: Alex Banks, Eve Porcello
books.description: A hands-on guide to building modern web applications using React and Redux. Covers components, state management, hooks, and best practices.

books.title: Effective Java
books.subTitle: Programming Language Guide
books.author: Joshua Bloch
books.description: Comprehensive best practices for writing robust, maintainable, and efficient Java code.

books.title: JavaScript: The Good Parts
books.subTitle: Unearthing the Excellence in JavaScript
books.author: Douglas Crockford
books.description: An essential guide to the best features of JavaScript, helping developers write cleaner and more reliable code.

books.title: Clean Code
books.subTitle: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.description: This book offers practical advice on writing cleaner, more maintainable software with examples in Java.

books.title: Design Patterns
books.subTitle: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
books.author: Erich Gamma, Richard Helm, Ralph Johnson, John Vlissides
books.description: The classic book introducing software design patterns, with solutions to common design challenges.

books.title: Spring in Action
books.subTitle: Covers Spring 5
books.author: Craig Walls
books.description: Comprehensive guide to building enterprise Java applications with the Spring framework.

books.title: Continuous Delivery
books.subTitle: Reliable Software Releases through Build, Test, and Deployment Automation
books.author: Jez Humble, David Farley
books.description: A foundational book on DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment automation.

books.title: Kubernetes: Up and Running
books.subTitle: Dive into the Future of Infrastructure
books.author: Brendan Burns, Joe Beda, Kelsey Hightower
books.description: Practical guide to running containerized applications using Kubernetes, written by its creators.

books.title: Introduction to Algorithms
books.subTitle: The 'CLRS' Standard Textbook
books.author: Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, Clifford Stein
books.description: The definitive textbook on algorithms, widely used in universities worldwide.
